ðŸ“Œ Inker is an intuitive yet developmental approach to aid web readers with the facility to highlight texts and save them for future reference.

ðŸ“Œ Need to take a break ? Do not worry, inker has got you covered. Just highlight the texts and resume when you are back. The highlighted texts are saved until you delete them. Reading gets colorful with various customizations that inker offers like color, size and the style of the highlighter.

ðŸ“Œ Eliminate  the hassle of switching tabs to store the texts from one page into another docs tab.
